acqinfo.p: The collection was the gift of Wilbert H. Rusch, Sr. (donor no. 6761) and came to the library in 1982.

bioghist.p: Wilbert H. Rusch was a professor of biology and geology at Concordia College in Ann Arbor, Michigan. He was also a founding member of the Creation Research Society, which was a research and publishing organization advocating the creationist or biblical view of the origins of life.

scopecontent.p: The collection includes copies of the Creation Research Society's publicationCreation Research Quarterly, and other books, articles, and newsletters relating to the advocacy of the creationist view of the origins of life. There is also one file relating to the Michigan Energy Educators Forum, 1979-1981.
